record.field:
bonus_total = (contract.wage/30) * 15 seniority = contract._l10n_mx_edi_get_days(contract.date_start, payslip.l10n_mx_edi_payment_date) year = float(payslip.l10n_mx_edi_payment_date.split('-')[0]) days_year = 365 if year % 4 == 0 and year % 100 != 0 or year % 400 == 0: days_year = 366
if 1 > seniority/days_year: bonus_total = (bonus_total / days_year) * seniority
# Minimum wage set with values of SAT http://www.sat.gob.mx/informacion_fiscal/tablas_indicadores/Documents/salarios_minimos_historico.xls
minimum_wage = contract.company_id.l10n_mx_edi_minimum_wage amount_exempt = minimum_wage * 30
diff = bonus_total - amount_exempt
result = bonus_total if diff >= 0: result = amount_exempt
Sólo 30 días de SM queda exento, el excedente es gravado

bonus_total = (contract.wage/30) * 15 seniority = contract._l10n_mx_edi_get_days(contract.date_start, payslip.l10n_mx_edi_payment_date) year = float(payslip.l10n_mx_edi_payment_date.split('-')[0]) days_year = 365 if year % 4 == 0 and year % 100 != 0 or year % 400 == 0: days_year = 366
if 1 > seniority/days_year: bonus_total = (bonus_total /days_year) * seniority
# Minimum wage set with values of SAT http://www.sat.gob.mx/informacion_fiscal/tablas_indicadores/Documents/salarios_minimos_historico.xls
minimum_wage = contract.company_id.l10n_mx_edi_minimum_wage amount_exempt = minimum_wage * 30
diff = bonus_total - amount_exempt result = 0 if diff > 0: result = diff

# http://www.sat.gob.mx/informacion_fiscal/tablas_indicadores/Paginas/salarios_minimos.aspx
sbc = contract.l10n_mx_edi_integrated_salary minimum_wage = contract.company_id.l10n_mx_edi_minimum_wage days_schedule = {'01': 1, '02': 7, '03': 14, '04': 15, '05': 30, '06': 60} days_work = days_schedule.get(contract.schedule_pay, 0) salary = days_work * sbc
result = 0.02375 * salary imss = 0 if ((sbc / minimum_wage) > 3): imss = 0.004 * (sbc - minimum_wage*3) *days_work
result = (result+imss) * -1

# Based on http://www.sat.gob.mx/informacion_fiscal/devoluciones_compensaciones/Paginas/subsidio_al_empleo.aspx income_period = categories.PERGRA table = [(0.01, 1768.96, 407.02), (1768.97, 2653.38, 406.83), (2653.39, 3472.84, 406.62), (3472.85, 3537.87, 392.77), (3537.88, 4446.15, 382.46), (4446.16, 4717.18, 354.23), (4717.19, 5335.42, 324.87), (5335.43, 6224.67, 294.63), (6224.68, 7113.90, 253.54), (7113.91, 7382.33, 217.61), (7382.34, 99999999.00, 0)] days_schedule = {'01': 1, '02': 7, '03': 14, '04': 15, '05': 30} result = 0 days_work = days_schedule.get(contract.schedule_pay, 0) if days_work: income_period = (income_period / days_work) * 30 for value in table: if income_period >=value[0] and value[1] >= income_period: result = value[2] break result = (result * days_work) / 30
